## RouteState interface

路由状态描述

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteState<TRootState extends RootState = RootState, TPagename extends string = string> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [action](./react-web.routestate.action.md) | [RouteHistoryAction](./react-web.routehistoryaction.md) | 切换动作 |
|  [key](./react-web.routestate.key.md) | string | 唯一ID，通过该ID可以找到此记录 |
|  [pagename](./react-web.routestate.pagename.md) | TPagename | [PagenameMap](./react-web.pagenamemap.md) 中定义的key名，参见 [createRouteModule(...)](./react-web.createroutemodule.md) |
|  [params](./react-web.routestate.params.md) | TRootState | 路由参数，Elux中的路由参数也是一种Store，参见：<code>路由状态化</code> |
